row.entry: Complex MIME Type with Vendor Specification

entry.para: In the MIME type for the Accept HTTP header, a request may specify which vendor namespace it is expecting to format the response.
For example, in application/vnd.rackspace-v1.0+xml, the vendor namespace has been specified as vnd.rackspace and version v1.0 of the service API has been requested.
Vendor specifications do not modify how the versioning service routes requests. The information is still parsed and stored, however, and may be utilized by other components further down the stack.

row.entry: Complex MIME Type with Version Specification

entry.para: In the MIME type for the Accept HTTP header, a request may specify which version it is expecting to process the response.
For example, in application/v1.0+xml, version v1.0 of the service API has been requested.
